title: Pixel 3 not responding (dead) shortly after latest Android 11 update
content:
After the latest Android 11 update (Oct 11), my Pixel 3 phone became unresponsive. Completely dead,  no sounds, no vibration and not being able to turn it back on.

When I'm charging it the phone gets warm but still not able to switch it on.

Any guesses what it can be and how to fix it?
